# about
Simple contact manager written in python, using tkinter

# features
[x] tkinter
[x] json
[ ] vcard
[x] show saved
[x] edit saved
[x] add new
[x] delete old
[x] sort a-z, z-a
[x] show only some columns
[x] check phone number, mail and bday
[x] startup(load) notification
[x] contact search

# architecture
3 classes:
- contatcs - ease of use and parsing
- gui - tkinter graphical frontend
- organizator - database and contact manipulation backend
